channel.title: How to Ollie on a Skateboard! (Now with pics)
channel.description:
Perfect Guide to Skateboarding!
I am not responsible for any injuries that occur in the progress
How to Ollie!
Chapter One: The set-up!
Step 1) Place back foot on tail and front foot in the middle or somewhere near there thats comftorable!
[URL=http://img113.imageshack.us/my.php?image=kickflip2du0.gif][IMG]http://img113.imageshack.us/img113/4657/kickflip2du0.th.gif[/img][/URL]
Step 2) Okay now comes the hard stuff...
Chapter Two: The Pop!!!
[URL=http://img339.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ollievw0.jpg][IMG]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/5746/ollievw0.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Step 1) Slam the tail on the ground causing it to pop
Step 2) Even your shoulders out so your body and skateboard becomes straight.
Step 3) Bend knees and hit the ground!
Dont die!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Drew~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
